MSAM Lambda for periodically updating the node cache
MSAM Lambda for peridically updating the connection cache
MSAM Lambda for handling diagram and tile updates from tags
MSAM Lambda for running all applicable commands for a given managed instance
MSAM Lambda for processing outputs from running a command on a managed instance

get.summary: API entry point for retrieving all item positions in a view.

delete.summary: API entry point for removing nodes from a view.

put.summary: API entry point for setting nodes in a view. This adds new nodes and overwrites existing nodes. It does not replace the entire set.

post.summary: API entry point for setting nodes in a view. This adds new nodes and overwrites existing nodes. It does not replace the entire set.

get.summary: API entry point to return all the current channel names.

put.summary: API entry point to set the nodes for a given channel name.

post.summary: API entry point to set the nodes for a given channel name.

get.summary: API entry point to get the nodes for a given channel name.

delete.summary: API entry point to delete a channel.

get.summary: API entry point to get or set the object value for a setting.

put.summary: API entry point to get or set the object value for a setting.

post.summary: API entry point to get or set the object value for a setting.

delete.summary: API entry point to get or set the object value for a setting.

get.summary: API entry point to retrieve items from the cache under the service and region name.
API entry point to retrieve items from the cache under the service.
API entry point to retrieve items from the cache by arn.

delete.summary: API entry point to delete items from the cache.

put.summary: API entry point to add items to the cache.

post.summary: API entry point to add items to the cache.

get.summary: API entry point to retrieve all regions based on EC2.
API entry point to retrieve all CloudWatch alarms for a given region.

put.summary: API entry point to subscribe one or more nodes to a CloudWatch alarm in a region.

post.summary: API entry point to subscribe one or more nodes to a CloudWatch alarm in a region.

put.summary: API entry point to unsubscribe one or more nodes to a CloudWatch alarm in a region.

post.summary: API entry point to unsubscribe one or more nodes to a CloudWatch alarm in a region.

get.summary: API entry point to return subscribed nodes of a CloudWatch alarm in a region.
API entry point to return nodes subscribed to alarms in a given alarm state (OK, ALARM, INSUFFICIENT_DATA).
API entry point to return all alarms subscribed to by a node.
API entry point to return a unique list of all subscribed alarms in the database.
API entry point to retrieve all alert events in a given state (set, clear).
API entry point to retrieve all alert events in a given state (set, clear) from a specific source.
API entry point to retrieve all pipeline events in a given state (set, clear) and grouped by pipeline state (down, degraded, running)
API entry point to return all CloudWatch events related to a node.
API entry point to return all CloudWatch events related to a node from start_time to now.
API entry point to return all CloudWatch events related to a node for a given time range.
API entry point to test the API key authentication and retrieve the build timestamp.

Content.description: How many alerts are currently active on the encoder?

AlarmsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores alarm states for MSAM.
AlarmsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

ChannelsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores channel definitions for MSAM.
ChannelsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

ContentTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores cached content for MSAM.
ContentTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

EventsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that collects events for MSAM.
EventsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

LayoutTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores diagram layout for MSAM.
LayoutTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

SettingsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores configuration settings for MSAM.
SettingsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

CloudWatchEventsTableName.Description: This is the DynamoDB table name that stores CloudWatch events for MSAM.
CloudWatchEventsTableName.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

CacheItemTTL.Description: This is the maximum time in seconds a cached item will remain if never updated.
CacheItemTTL.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

BucketBasename.Description: This is the basename of the bucket that holds the MSAM code base.
BucketBasename.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.

CoreIAMRoleARN.Description: This is the IAM Role ARN for the Core Lambda functions.
CoreIAMRoleARN.ConstraintDescription: Please enter a value for this field.
